synopsis.text: Graduate Work 2012 from Yuanyuan Hu, Tokyo University of the Arts, presents an enchanting tale set in the heart of China during the 1960s. Amidst the tranquility of a garden, an elderly woman finds solace from the day's heat. As twilight descends, the sky is bathed in a warm orange hue, and the first blooms of an evening primrose unfurl. Transported by the beauty of the flower, the woman embarks on a nostalgic journey through her childhood memories, recalling a time when she radiated youth and beauty. The anime employs a distinctive Chinese cutout picture style, emphasizing the delicate texture of the paper and the vivid colors to create a captivating visual experience.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
